hints.title: Dobrushin Contraction (Established)
hints.content:
295: :label: thm-dobrushin-established
296: 
297: The full operator contracts in the **discrete status metric** $d_{\text{status}}$ (number of alive/dead changes):
298: 
299: $$
300: \mathbb{E}[d_{\text{status}}(S_{t+1}, \pi_{\text{QSD}})] \leq \gamma \cdot d_{\text{status}}(S_t, \pi_{\text{QSD}}) + K
301: $$
302: 
303: where $\gamma = (1 - \lambda_{\text{clone}}\tau) < 1$.
